005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014/**
015 * A base class for an assembly that is a member of a containing model.
016 *
017 * @param <PARENT>
018 *          the Java type of the parent model container for this instance
019 * @param <DEFINITION>
020 *          the Java type of the related assembly definition
021 * @param <INSTANCE>
022 *          the Java type of the implementing instance type
023 * @param <PARENT_DEFINITION>
024 *          the Java type of the containing assembly definition
025 */
026public abstract class AbstractAssemblyInstance<
027    PARENT extends IContainerModel,
028    DEFINITION extends IAssemblyDefinition,
029    INSTANCE extends IAssemblyInstance,
030    PARENT_DEFINITION extends IAssemblyDefinition>
031    extends AbstractNamedModelInstance<PARENT, PARENT_DEFINITION>
032    implements IAssemblyInstance, IFeatureDefinitionReferenceInstance<DEFINITION, INSTANCE> {
033
034  /**
035   * Construct a new assembly instance that is contained with the provided parent
036   * container.
037   *
038   * @param parent
039   *          the parent container for this instance
040   */
041  protected AbstractAssemblyInstance(@NonNull PARENT parent) {
042    super(parent);
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  public DEFINITION getDefinition() {
047    QName qname = getReferencedDefinitionQName();
048    // this should always be not null
049    IAssemblyDefinition definition = getContainingModule().getScopedAssemblyDefinitionByName(qname);
050    if (definition == null) {
051      throw new IllegalStateException(
052          String.format("Unable to resolve assembly reference '%s' in definition '%s' in module '%s'",
053              qname,
054              getParentContainer().getOwningDefinition().getName(),
055              getContainingModule().getShortName()));
056    }
057    return ObjectUtils.asType(definition);
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Generates a "coordinate" string for the assembly instance.
062   *
063   * @return the coordinate
064   */
065  @SuppressWarnings("null")
066  @Override
067  public String toCoordinates() {
068    IDefinition definition = getDefinition();
069    return String.format("assembly instance %s -> %s in module %s (@%d(%d)",
070        getXmlQName(),
071        definition.getDefinitionQName(),
072        getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule().getShortName(),
073        hashCode(),
074        definition.hashCode());
075  }
076}
